creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: inside wooden box with inscriptions on both exterior and interior of lid, no tissue around scroll; gold support fabric; image of a mountain landscape densely packed in black ink with three lines of inscription in UL corner; six red chops, two square chops stacked vertically on L side of inscription and one rectangular chop on the UR side of inscription, one large square chop in LL corner and one rectangular and one irregular shaped chop in LR corner
title: Mountain Landscape
